attributes.action: Make it compulsary that all 16-18 year olds spend a minimum of 6 months doing National Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: National Service is still currectly used in many other countries accross Europe and the World in countries such as Austria, Denmark, Germany, Greece, Israel, the Republic of China (Taiwan), Russia, Singapore, South Korea, Sweden, and Switzerland.  I think that if we re-introduced this in the UK the crime levels would be much reduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
